p: Fidelity level highlights the medicinal flora, Medicinal plants with maximum curative properties have the highest fidelity level, i.e., 100%. In the present investigation, the FL varied from 20 to 100%. The plant species most commonly utilized in the research area with 100% fidelity levels were Acacia modesta and Morchella esculenta, which were used to treat hepatitis and infertility, respectively. The FL determined for, Oxalis corniculata (stomach disorders), Mentha longifolia (Diarrhea), Zanthoxylum armatum (abdominal pain), Azadirachta indica (Hepatitis), Withania somnifera (Pneumonia), Berberis lycium14 (Diabetes), and Aconitum violaceum (Arthritis) were 97.87, 95.65, 95.65, 95.55, 93.47, 93.33 and 86.36% respectively.
